long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Consensus Capture helps B2B revenue teams use their product to tell stories. Using Capture, sales, presales, marketing, and customer success teams can easily personalize product screens by editing text, images, and other key elements they wish to customize to their buyer’s needs. Once customized they can instantly save screens to their desktop to utilize as part of Tours within their Consensus demos. Consensus Capture is the perfect tool for anyone wanting to create professional grade product tours quickly, without any coding experience.
